title: 求一个1.16.1可用的fabric 尸 体 mod
author: Oganesson
txt_content:
嗯……看标题大概明白了吧，功能就是死后保存物品栏
curseforge上面应该有……只不过网太慢了不好找
注意：好像某个墓碑的mod我用不了，所以就别找那个了

replies.author: jingshen
replies.txt_content:
找了找curseforge，fabric的墓碑mod确实很少。。
下面两个是支持1.16.1而且应该还在更新的：
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/gravestones
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/better-graves

replies.author: Freeze_Dolphin
replies.txt_content:
